Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 2nd overall pick, by Arizona in 2010...
Had first career hit (double) on 4/7/2012, off Neftali Feliz (FLA)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/13/2012, off James Reed (SF)...
Was selected to the 2013 Allstar game...
Traded from Arizona to Los Angeles (A) on 2/8/2014 (Going to ARI: C B. McCann, 3B R. Zimmerman, RF E. Chavez, DH M. Jacobs. Going to LAA: C C. Santana, P C. Ray)...
Had 5 hits with 0 RBI against New York (A) on 7/13/2014...
Was selected to the 2014 Allstar game...
Injured on 7/18/2014 with a Strained Back Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Had 5 hits with 2 RBI against Texas on 4/22/2015...
Was selected to the 2015 Allstar game...
Had 6 hits with 1 RBI against Texas on 9/15/2015...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/21/2015, hitting .485 with 3 HR, 6 RBI...
Had 5 hits with 2 RBI against Kansas City on 10/16/2015...
Was selected to the 2016 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/23/2016, hitting .542 with 1 HR, 5 RBI...
Had 5 hits with 4 RBI against Seattle on 9/23/2016...
Had 5 hits with 4 RBI against Chicago (A) on 6/19/2017...
Was selected to the 2017 Allstar game...
Drove in 8 runs against Washington on 7/16/2017...
Injured on 7/18/2017 with a Inflamed Back Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Was selected to the 2018 Allstar game...
Injured on 5/26/2019 with a Jammed Finger, out for one week...
Traded from Los Angeles (A) to Houston on 6/30/2019 (Going to HOU: C C. Santana, 2B B. Crawford, P L. Rojas, P B. Smith. Going to LAA: 1B R. Gonzales)...
Was selected to the 2019 Allstar game...
Injured on 8/16/2021 with a Fractured Hand, out for 4 weeks...
